spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Talis is a 9th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Talis has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Talis has {@item +1 scale mail} and a {@item wand of winter|hotdq}.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Talis has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Winter Strike (3/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when Talis hits with a melee attack, she can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.
